description:
A dialog component for confirming simple actions. This will be rendered above the content of the main window and
present just two options to the user, one to proceed with the action and the other to cancel it.

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the button for the confirm (positive) action.

props.name: alternateColor
props.description: Alternate confirm button color for creating a gradient button. NOTE: can also be the same color as 'color'.

props.name: cancelLabel
props.description: The label of the button for the cancel (negative) action.

props.name: confirmLabel
props.description: The label of the button for the confirm (positive) action.

props.name: question
props.description: The dialog question. Can be html (rendered using v-html).

events.name: cancel
events.description: emitted when the user clicks the cancel (negative) action button.

events.name: confirm
events.description: emitted when the user clicks the confirm (positive) action button.
